item.title: Construction in freescape how rto add more objects?
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

well i wanna add more objects for con but i don’t understand how it works this is what i have

if(summonLevel >= 99) sendQuest("@gre@Flaming alter", 14872); else sendQuest("Flaming alter (level 99)", 14872);

is in music list

then i found the case

case 1590: // flame altar if(summonLevel >= 95) { makeGlobalObject(absX,absY,4090,2,10); sendMessage("You Construct a flaming fire altar!"); stillgfx(436, absY, absX); npcId = 1211; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; actionTimer = 20; addSummonXP (2100); } if(summonLevel < 95) { sendMessage("You need a higher construciton level"); } break;

and then i found something i don’t understand :s

case 58024: SummonNPC(1590); break;

how do u know the case ??

help plz

Read full topic
